original_text: Leah saw that she had stopped having children. So she gave her servant Zilpah to Jacob as a wife.
korean_text: 레아가 자기의 출산이 멈춤을 보고 그의 시녀 실바를 데려다가 야곱에게 주어 아내로 삼게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: that she had stopped having children
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 자녀를 낳는 것을 멈추었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: So she gave her servant Zilpah
